feature.label: iSphere Task Tags for WDSCi 7.0 (optional)
feature.description: The "iSphere Task Tags Feature" adds task tags to the Lpex editor. Task tags, such as TODO, FIXME, etc. are used to add markers to your source code in order to remind you that something needs to be done or fixed.
